problem_names:
lemma low_Eval[rule_format]:
 "(\<forall> x . x \<in> EVars e \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t . s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> evalE e s = evalE e t)"

lemma low_EvalB[rule_format]:
 "(\<forall> x . x \<in> BVars b \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t . s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b t)"
lemma Secure_comp: "\<lbrakk>secure c1; secure c2\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> secure (Comp c1 c2)"

lemma Secure_iff:
" \<lbrakk>secure c1; secure c2;
   \<forall> s ss. s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b ss\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> secure (Iff b c1 c2)"

lemma secure_while_aux[rule_format]:
"\<forall> n m . n \<le> k \<longrightarrow> m \<le> k \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t ss tt . (s , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss) \<longrightarrow>  
                 (t , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  tt) \<longrightarrow> 
                 secure c \<longrightarrow> 
                 (\<forall>s ss. s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b ss) \<longrightarrow> 
                 s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> ss \<approx> tt)"

lemma Secure_while:
" \<lbrakk>secure c;
   \<forall> s ss. s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b ss\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> secure (While b c)"

lemma secureI_secureFillI_Aux[rule_format]:
"\<forall> n m . n \<le> k \<longrightarrow> m \<le> k \<longrightarrow> 
       (\<forall> C d s t ss tt X . (s , d \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n t) \<longrightarrow>  
                          (ss , d \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  tt) \<longrightarrow> 
                          s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow>  
                          d = Fill C c \<longrightarrow>
                          LOW X C \<longrightarrow>
                          LOW X Ctxt_Body \<longrightarrow>
                          body = Fill Ctxt_Body c \<longrightarrow> secure c \<longrightarrow> t \<approx> tt)"

lemma secureI_secureFillI: 
  "\<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> secure (Fill C c)"

theorem
  "\<lbrakk> secure c; LOW X C;  LOW X Ctxt_Body; s \<approx> ss; s,(Fill C c)\<Down>t; 
     ss,(Fill C c)\<Down>tt; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c; CONTEXT res = low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> t res = tt res"
translations:
lemma low_Eval[rule_format]:
 "(\<forall> x . x \<in> EVars e \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t . s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> evalE e s = evalE e t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>x.
        x \<in> EVars e \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
    (\<forall>s t.  s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow> evalE e s = evalE e t)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>x.
        x \<in> EVars e \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
    (\<forall>s t.  s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow> evalE e s = evalE e t)
apply (induct e)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       (\<forall>xa.
           xa \<in> EVars (varE x) \<longrightarrow>
           CONTEXT xa = low) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>s t.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           evalE (varE x) s = evalE (varE x) t)
 2. \<And>x.
       (\<forall>xa.
           xa \<in> EVars (valE x) \<longrightarrow>
           CONTEXT xa = low) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>s t.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           evalE (valE x) s = evalE (valE x) t)
 3. \<And>x1a e1 e2.
       \<lbrakk>(\<forall>x.
                    x \<in> EVars e1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                (\<forall>s t.
                     s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                    evalE e1 s = evalE e1 t);
        (\<forall>x.
            x \<in> EVars e2 \<longrightarrow>
            CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
        (\<forall>s t.
             s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
            evalE e2 s = evalE e2 t)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<forall>x.
                             x \<in> EVars (opE x1a e1 e2) \<longrightarrow>
                             CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                         (\<forall>s t.
                              s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) s =
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) t)
apply (simp add: twiddle_def)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       (\<forall>xa.
           xa \<in> EVars (valE x) \<longrightarrow>
           CONTEXT xa = low) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>s t.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           evalE (valE x) s = evalE (valE x) t)
 2. \<And>x1a e1 e2.
       \<lbrakk>(\<forall>x.
                    x \<in> EVars e1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                (\<forall>s t.
                     s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                    evalE e1 s = evalE e1 t);
        (\<forall>x.
            x \<in> EVars e2 \<longrightarrow>
            CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
        (\<forall>s t.
             s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
            evalE e2 s = evalE e2 t)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<forall>x.
                             x \<in> EVars (opE x1a e1 e2) \<longrightarrow>
                             CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                         (\<forall>s t.
                              s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) s =
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) t)
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1a e1 e2.
       \<lbrakk>(\<forall>x.
                    x \<in> EVars e1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                (\<forall>s t.
                     s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                    evalE e1 s = evalE e1 t);
        (\<forall>x.
            x \<in> EVars e2 \<longrightarrow>
            CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
        (\<forall>s t.
             s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
            evalE e2 s = evalE e2 t)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<forall>x.
                             x \<in> EVars (opE x1a e1 e2) \<longrightarrow>
                             CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
                         (\<forall>s t.
                              s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) s =
                             evalE (opE x1a e1 e2) t)
apply clarsimp

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

primrec BVars::"BExpr \<Rightarrow> Var set"
where
"BVars (compB f e1 e2) = EVars e1 \<union> EVars e2"

lemma low_EvalB[rule_format]:
 "(\<forall> x . x \<in> BVars b \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t . s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>x.
        x \<in> BVars b \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
    (\<forall>s t.  s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b t)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>x.
        x \<in> BVars b \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
    (\<forall>s t.  s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b t)
apply (induct b)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1a x2a x3a.
       (\<forall>x.
           x \<in> BVars (compB x1a x2a x3a) \<longrightarrow>
           CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>s t.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           evalB (compB x1a x2a x3a) s = evalB (compB x1a x2a x3a) t)
apply (rename_tac Expr1 Expr2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2.
       (\<forall>x.
           x \<in> BVars (compB x1a Expr1 Expr2) \<longrightarrow>
           CONTEXT x = low) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>s t.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           evalB (compB x1a Expr1 Expr2) s =
           evalB (compB x1a Expr1 Expr2) t)
apply clarsimp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply (subgoal_tac "evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply (rule low_Eval)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t x.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; x \<in> EVars Expr1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  s \<approx> t 
 3. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply fast

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  s \<approx> t 
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply (subgoal_tac "evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t;
        evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t;
        evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply (rule low_Eval)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t x.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t;
        x \<in> EVars Expr2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  s \<approx> t 
 3. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t;
        evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply fast

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  s \<approx> t 
 2. \<And>x1a Expr1 Expr2 s t.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr1 \<longrightarrow>
                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>
                   (x \<in> EVars Expr2 \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low);
         s \<approx> t ; evalE Expr1 s = evalE Expr1 t;
        evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =
                         x1a (evalE Expr1 t) (evalE Expr2 t)
apply assumption

goal (1 subgoal):

                    CONTEXT x = low) \<and>

        evalE Expr2 s = evalE Expr2 t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x1a (evalE Expr1 s) (evalE Expr2 s) =

apply simp

done

text\<open>The variables possibly read from during the evaluation of $c$
are denoted by $\mathit{Vars\; c}$. Note that in the clause for
assignments the variable that is assigned to is not included in the
set.\<close>

primrec Vars::"IMP \<Rightarrow> Var set"
where
"Vars Skip = {}" |
"Vars (Assign x e) = EVars e" |
"Vars (Comp c d) = Vars c \<union> Vars d" |
"Vars (While b c) = BVars b \<union> Vars c" |
"Vars (Iff b c d) = BVars b \<union> Vars c \<union> Vars d" |
"Vars Call = {}"

text\<open>For contexts, we define when a set $X$ of variables is an upper
bound for the variables read from.\<close>

primrec CtxtVars::"Var set \<Rightarrow> CtxtProg \<Rightarrow> bool"
where
"CtxtVars X Ctxt_Hole = True" |
"CtxtVars X Ctxt_Skip = True" |
"CtxtVars X (Ctxt_Assign x e) = (EVars e \<subseteq> X)" |
"CtxtVars X (Ctxt_Comp C1 C2) = (CtxtVars X C1 \<and> CtxtVars X C2)" |
"CtxtVars X (Ctxt_If b C1 C2) = (BVars b \<subseteq> X \<and> CtxtVars X C1
                                             \<and>  CtxtVars X C2)" |
"CtxtVars X (Ctxt_While b C) = (BVars b \<subseteq> X \<and> CtxtVars X C)" |
"CtxtVars X Ctxt_Call = True"
lemma Secure_comp: "\<lbrakk>secure c1; secure c2\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> secure (Comp c1 c2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>secure c1; secure c2\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> secure (Comp c1 c2)
apply (unfold secure_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                 s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                s , c1 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
                t , c1 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt ;
     \<forall>s t ss tt.
         s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
        s , c2 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
        t , c2 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>s t ss tt.
                          s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                         s , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
                         t , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>
                          ss \<approx> tt
apply (rule, rule, rule, rule)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss tt.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                    s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                   s , c1 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
                   t , c1 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt ;
        \<forall>s t ss tt.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           s , c2 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
           t , c2 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                         s , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
                         t , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>
                          ss \<approx> tt
apply (rule, rule, rule)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss tt.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                    s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                   s , c1 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
                   t , c1 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt ;
        \<forall>s t ss tt.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           s , c2 \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
           t , c2 \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt ;
         s \<approx> t ; s , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> ss ;
        t , Comp c1 c2 \<Down> tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt
apply (unfold Sem_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss tt.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                    s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        t , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
                    ss \<approx> tt ;
        \<forall>s t ss tt.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                s , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                t , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
            ss \<approx> tt ;
         s \<approx> t ;
        \<exists>n.  s , Comp c1 c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ;
        \<exists>n.  t , Comp c1 c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt
apply (erule exE)+

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss tt n na.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                    s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        t , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
                    ss \<approx> tt ;
        \<forall>s t ss tt.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                s , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                t , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
            ss \<approx> tt ;
         s \<approx> t ;  s , Comp c1 c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ;
         t , Comp c1 c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt
apply (erule Sem_eval_cases)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss tt n na nb r m.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>s t ss tt.
                    s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        s , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>n.
                        t , c1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
                    ss \<approx> tt ;
        \<forall>s t ss tt.
            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                s , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
           (\<exists>n.
                t , c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
            ss \<approx> tt ;
         s \<approx> t ;  t , Comp c1 c2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  tt ;

" \<lbrakk>secure c1; secure c2;
   \<forall> s ss. s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b ss\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> secure (Iff b c1 c2)"

lemma secure_while_aux[rule_format]:
"\<forall> n m . n \<le> k \<longrightarrow> m \<le> k \<longrightarrow> 
  (\<forall> s t ss tt . (s , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss) \<longrightarrow>  
                 (t , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  tt) \<longrightarrow> 
                 secure c \<longrightarrow> 
                 (\<forall>s ss. s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow> evalB b s = evalB b ss) \<longrightarrow> 
                 s \<approx> t \<longrightarrow> ss \<approx> tt)"

            t , While b c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  tt  \<longrightarrow>
           secure c \<longrightarrow>
           (\<forall>s ss.

            s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt )

text\<open>A constant representing the procedure body with holes.\<close>
consts Ctxt_Body::CtxtProg

text\<open>The following predicate expresses that all variables read from
by a command $c$ are contained in the set $X$ of low variables.\<close>

definition LOW::"Var set \<Rightarrow> CtxtProg \<Rightarrow> bool"
where "LOW X C = (CtxtVars X C \<and> (\<forall> x . x : X \<longrightarrow> CONTEXT x = low))"

lemma secureI_secureFillI_Aux[rule_format]:
"\<forall> n m . n \<le> k \<longrightarrow> m \<le> k \<longrightarrow> 
       (\<forall> C d s t ss tt X . (s , d \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n t) \<longrightarrow>  
                          (ss , d \<rightarrow>\<^sub>m  tt) \<longrightarrow> 
                          s \<approx> ss \<longrightarrow>  
                          d = Fill C c \<longrightarrow>
                          LOW X C \<longrightarrow>
                          LOW X Ctxt_Body \<longrightarrow>
                          body = Fill Ctxt_Body c \<longrightarrow> secure c \<longrightarrow> t \<approx> tt)"

           d = Fill C c \<longrightarrow>

text\<open>By induction on the maximal height of the operational judgement
(hidden in the definition of $\mathit{secure}$) we can prove that the
security of $c$ implies that of $\mathit{Fill}\ C\ c$, provided that
the context and the procedure-context satisfy the $\mathit{LOW}$
predicate for some $X$, and that the "real" body is obtained by
substituting $c$ into the procedure context.\<close>

lemma secureI_secureFillI: 
  "\<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> secure (Fill C c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body;
     body = Fill Ctxt_Body c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> secure (Fill C c)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body;
     body = Fill Ctxt_Body c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> secure (Fill C c)
apply (simp (no_asm_simp) add: secure_def Sem_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body;
     body = Fill Ctxt_Body c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>s t.
                          s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
                         (\<forall>ss.
                             (\<exists>n.
                                  s , Fill C
 c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ) \<longrightarrow>
                             (\<forall>tt.
                                 (\<exists>n.
                                      t , Fill C
     c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  tt ) \<longrightarrow>
                                  ss \<approx> tt ))
apply clarsimp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss n tt na.
       \<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c;
         s \<approx> t ;  s , Fill C c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ;
         t , Fill C c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow>  ss \<approx> tt
apply (rule secureI_secureFillI_Aux)
prefer 3
apply assumption
prefer 4
apply assumption
prefer 3
apply assumption
apply (subgoal_tac "n \<le> n+na", assumption)
apply (erule thin_rl, simp)
apply (erule thin_rl, simp)
apply (erule thin_rl,fastforce)
apply assumption
apply assumption
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>s t ss n tt na.
       \<lbrakk>secure c; LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c;
         s \<approx> t ;  s , Fill C c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>n  ss ;
         t , Fill C c \<rightarrow>\<^sub>na  tt \<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> secure c
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

text\<open>Consequently, a (low) variable representing the result of
the attacking context does not leak any unwanted information.\<close>
consts res::Var

theorem
  "\<lbrakk> secure c; LOW X C;  LOW X Ctxt_Body; s \<approx> ss; s,(Fill C c)\<Down>t; 
     ss,(Fill C c)\<Down>tt; body = Fill Ctxt_Body c; CONTEXT res = low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> t res = tt res"
apply (drule secureI_secureFillI)
apply assumption
apply assumption
apply assumption
apply (unfold secure_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body;  s \<approx> ss ;
     s , Fill C c \<Down> t ; ss , Fill C c \<Down> tt ;
     body = Fill Ctxt_Body c; CONTEXT res = low;
     \<forall>s t ss tt.
         s \<approx> t  \<longrightarrow>
        s , Fill C c \<Down> ss  \<longrightarrow>
        t , Fill C c \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>
         ss \<approx> tt \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> t res = tt res
apply (erule_tac x=s in allE, erule_tac x=ss in allE)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>LOW X C; LOW X Ctxt_Body;  s \<approx> ss ;
     s , Fill C c \<Down> t ; ss , Fill C c \<Down> tt ;
     body = Fill Ctxt_Body c; CONTEXT res = low;
     \<forall>ssa tt.
         s \<approx> ss  \<longrightarrow>
        s , Fill C c \<Down> ssa  \<longrightarrow>
        ss , Fill C c \<Down> tt  \<longrightarrow>
         ssa \<approx> tt \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> t res = tt res
apply (erule_tac x=t in allE, erule_tac x=tt in allE, clarsimp)
apply (simp add: twiddle_def)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
